query:
SELECT
            id,
            name,
            description,
            project_id,
            created_at,
            updated_at
        FROM role r
        WHERE ($1 OR project_id = $2)
            AND ($3 OR id = any($4))
            AND ($5 OR name ILIKE ('%' || $6 || '%'))
            --- PAGINATION
            AND ((r.created_at > $7 OR $7 IS NULL) OR (r.created_at = $7 AND r.id > $8))
        ORDER BY r.created_at, r.id ASC
        LIMIT $9
